name: ecommerce-base
description: E-commerce backend (FastAPI + PostgreSQL) and frontend (Next.js) using Docker Compose.

scripts.setup: docker compose run --rm backend bash -c "alembic -c app/alembic.ini upgrade head && python -m app.core.init_db"
scripts.restart: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d && docker compose run --rm backend bash -c "alembic -c app/alembic.ini upgrade head && python -m app.core.init_db"
scripts.db:shell: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d postgres
scripts.alembic:revision:init: docker compose exec backend alembic -c app/alembic.ini revision --autogenerate -m 'init models'
scripts.alembic:revision:add: docker compose exec backend alembic -c app/alembic.ini revision --autogenerate -m 'add new model'
scripts.alembic:upgrade: docker compose exec backend alembic -c app/alembic.ini upgrade head
scripts.alembic:downgrade: docker compose exec backend alembic -c app/alembic.ini downgrade base
scripts.reset:db: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db && sleep 5 && npm run alembic:upgrade && docker compose up -d backend frontend
